name: Flat Space
description:
Explore space with child-like wonder, but beware - you may not be alone. With crayon-styled art and rotating 2D objects in 3D-space, the universe of Flat Space has been described as "space travel through the mind of an 8-year old."

Displayed at the Babycastles art gallery in NYC as part of the Derivative Games exhibition. Inspired by Tom van den Boogaart's "Bernband."
